channel.title: WhiteScape v3.x Character Editor Tool v1.0
channel.description:
Yup, I'm creating some side-programs (a.k.a. tools) for whitescape v3.x server editting. First tool is my character editor tool
More info at: [url=http://whitefang-wf.no-ip.org/whitescape/forum/viewtopic.php?t=59]http://localhost:8080/whitescape/forum/viewtopic.php?t=59[/url] (must register to see <-> Ignore the mailing error and just login)
Greets, WhiteFang

item.title: WhiteScape v3.x Character Editor Tool v1.0
item.dc:creator: @RS-ixteen RS-ixteen
item.description:
@RS-ixteen wrote:

WhiteFangs Post:

I’ve already told some things about this tool in the development talk section…
And well, here is the tool !

Link: http://users.pandora.be/HBDarkness/whitescape/character_editor.rar

Information
This tool can create, edit and delete characters.
This tool has been tested on low level, we recommand you first to test it on some test files, and not right away on you’re good server files, the program meight screw them because it isn’t tested alot yet.

There is a server.cfg file included, if this file or any other file related to this tool is missing or deleted, you will get error from you’re computer, we recommand you to contact us or re-download the files.

When using this program for first time, click File -> Edit Config
And change the directory’s so they are correct (use the Browse button for easy change :p) !

Required files
ITEMS.txt from the helpfiles.rar
Link: http://users.pandora.be/HBDarkness/whitescape/helpfiles.rar

Well since the program isn’t tested much, you people can be the first testers to test it !

users.pandora.be/HBDarkness is an official mirror of WhiteScape

WHY NOT JUST POST THAT??

Read full topic
